description: Driven by a lifelong passion for technology, I thrive at the intersection of full-stack web development, AI innovation, and IT support-delivering innovative, user-centric solutions with a steadfast commitment to communication, collaboration, time management, critical thinking, attention to detail, problem solving, and accountability.
